author: Dom Calicchio
title: Kentucky judges order coronavirus patients, others to wear GPS ankle monitors for refusing to stay home
description: At least four people in Kentucky have been ordered by judges to wear GPS ankle monitors for allegedly defying health officials’ advice to stay home amid the coronavirus outbreak, according to reports.
content:
